title: January: The Godhead
content: “We believe in God, the Eternal Father, and in His Son, Jesus Christ, and in the Holy Ghost” (

The outlines in this unit will help the youth learn how to strengthen their faith in the members of the Godhead as they study the scriptures and share their testimonies with others. They will gain experience following the guidance of the Holy Ghost in their efforts to learn and teach the gospel. Encourage them to ask questions about what they are learning, to seek to learn more, and to share with others what they discover.
Outlines to choose from this month:
How does the Holy Ghost help me learn?
How can studying the scriptures help me learn about Heavenly Father?
How can I help others learn about Heavenly Father?
How can I learn to see Heavenly Father’s hand in all things?
How does the Holy Ghost help me teach the gospel?
Throughout this unit, you may want to remind the youth that the names of Deity are sacred (see
). Encourage them to use these names with reverence and respect.
